attributes.action: recognise that the petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NewLordsVision/?ref=newlordsvision was rejected in error and should be accepted for publication.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rejected petition contains original proposals for a reformed House of Lords which are not represented in any of the many petitions published on Lords reform in this site.

rejection.details: You're welcome to resubmit your original petition
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
